para.verbatim:
.. module:: user_interface :platform: Unix :synopsis: Python module for implement the user interface.
.. moduleauthor:: Ettore Sani
This module implements the user interface of the program. It is developed with the curses library, dividing the terminal into windows and calling specific functions to print strings and receive user inputs. The class windows_organiser stores all information about the user interface and implements some modes to make the code slighter.
